version_description: Bug fixes and performance improvements, including fixes for iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus, and iPhone SE.

Roon Essentials is the music player for music lovers, and 1.3 is our biggest release yet. With improved playlists and tags, support for Sonos devices, improved editing, and new Social Sharing features, there's no better way to enjoy the music you love.<br
